thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 15 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Azimut: Investors In Shareholder Pact Could Buy Up To 10 Percent Of Azimut Holding

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Azimut: Investors In Shareholder Pact Could Buy Up To 10 Percent Of Azimut Holding
text:
Jan 15 (Reuters) - Azimut Holding Spa:
* AZIMUT SAYS SHAREHOLDERS DISCUSSING POSSIBLE STRENGTHENING OF STAKE IN COMPANY
* AZIMUT SAYS INVESTORS IN SHAREHOLDER PACT COULD BUY UP TO 10 PERCENT OF AZIMUT HOLDING
* AZIMUT SHARES EXTEND GAINS UP 2 PERCENT * AZIMUT SAYS INSTITUTIONAL INVESTOR COULD TAKE PART IN STAKEBUILDING BUT PLANNING TO STAY BELOW MANDATORY BID THRESHOLD Source text for Eikon:
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
